attributes.action: Scrap all plans to introduce idenity cards in the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government’s proposal to introduce identity cards in the United Kingdom is an afront to the freedom and civil liberties of the British people.  Law abiding British subjects should not be treated like tagged criminals.  ID cards will not prevent crime, terrorism or fraud, all freeborn British subjects must object to this attack against their liberty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
